desc: Mashona Collections is the home of Ethnic Handmade items that are made of locally sourced aunthentic Africa Ankara Wax Print Fabric. From Mudcloth Inspired Print Fabric to Ankara Kente Print, we sure know how to make a bold statement! Our all round towels will match the two prints and give your home an effortless look.

layout.text: Wide selection of colours that will make a bold statement!
